snippet: Not expected to be a competitive member of the squad, Steve Stricker improved his chances by shooting a 68 that placed him just four strokes off the lead at the P.G.A. Championship.
abstract: Steve Stricker could still qualify as a competitive member of United States Ryder Cup team, despite his being picked as assistant captain; other golf news noted.

byline.original: By BILL PENNINGTON and BILL FIELDS

lead_paragraph: Not expected to be a competitive member of the squad, Steve Stricker improved his chances by shooting a 68 that placed him just four strokes off the lead at the P.G.A. Championship.

headline.seo: P.G.A. Championship 2014: Steve Stricker's Round Boosts His Cup Chances
headline.main: Spot on U.S. Ryder Cup Team Is Possibility for Stricker
headline.print_headline: U.S. Ryder Cup Berth Within Stricker’s Grasp
